## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3db812bd8b1ab7ed0904134849016b890fe0d5a9af394d37e09a169fc23fccba)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'aws-features-signin-proxy-client' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
